QuestData.Title: Nox Root
QuestData.Description:
In order to perform the ritual, I will need some nox root from Darkreach.
It is a unique plant that only grows within soil that has been corrupted by Drust magic.
Darkreach lies to the west, not far from my den. What was once a peaceful, verdant grove is now filled with blight and ruin.
I will travel to the Heart of the Forest to prepare the ritual. Meet me there when you have gathered the nox root.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Nox Root from Darkreach in Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, you were able to find enough nox root for the ritual. Unfortunately, we have another problem...
